plptool.dmf

Class CallbackRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • plptool.dmf.CallbackRegistry

  • public class CallbackRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles callback registration in PLPTool. Callbacks are registered by passing an implementation of the Callback interface to the register method along with the callback number.

    • Method Detail

      • setup

        public static java.lang.String[] setup(java.lang.String[] args)
        Runtime setup for the registry
        Parameters:
        args -
        Returns:

      • callback

        public static boolean callback(int callbackNum,
                               java.lang.Object param)
        Perform callback. Should be triggered by PLPTool ONLY. Do NOT call this method from a module.
        Parameters:
        callbackNum - Callback number to perform
        param - Parameter to the callback implementation
        Returns:
        True if one of the methods registered to this callback return true, false otherwise

      • register

        public static boolean register(Callback callback,
                               int callbackNum)
        Register a callback interface implementation to the specified callback number.
        Parameters:
        callbackNum - Callback number to register for
        callback - Reference to an instance of the callback interface implementation
        Returns:
        False if the callback number is invalid, true otherwise

      • register

        public static boolean register(Callback callback,
                               int... callbackNumbers)
        Register a callback interface implementation to multiple callback numbers
        Parameters:
        callbackNumbers - Callback numbers to register for
        callback - Reference to an instance of the callback interface implementation
        Returns:
        False if any of the specified numbers is invalid, true otherwise

      • unregister

        public static boolean unregister(Callback callback,
                                 int callbackNum)
        Unregister ONE instance of the callback (lowest index)
        Parameters:
        callback - Callback class to unregister
        callbackNum - Callback number
        Returns:

      • getCallbacks

        public static java.lang.Object[] getCallbacks(int callbackNum)
        Get all callbacks for a callback event as an Object array
        Parameters:
        callbackNum - Callback number
        Returns:
        Array of callbacks as objects
